entry.title: Hack The Box - Shibboleth
entry.summary: Shibboleth is about enumerating the UDP ports through which we can find IPMI service is running. We can dump the administrator hashes and log in to one of Shibboleth’s subdomains, where we can get RCE and an initial shell as Zabbix. With password reuse, we can move laterally to ipmi-svc. To root the box, it’s a simple RCE on an outdated version of MySQL. Recon Nmap The first thing that I ...

entry.title: Hack The Box - Node
entry.summary: Node is about enumerating an Express NodeJS application to find an API endpoint that discloses the usernames and password hashes. To root the box is a simple buffer overflow and possible by three other unintended ways. Recon Nmap The first thing that I do is run nmap scan that show this results: 0xStarlight@kali$ nmap -sC -sV -Pn 10.10.10.58 -vv > nmap_scan.conf 0xStarlight@kali$ cat n...
